function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty and limitations in understanding the impact of climatic variables on the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Inadequate public health policies and interventions may fail to reduce adverse consequences of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Comprehensive evaluation of confounding variables and their association with public health policies, and incorporating them into intervention strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, and comprehensive research methods","People":"General public, policymakers, and public health officials","Owner":"Public health institutions, research organizations, and policy-making bodies"}]}
